name: To The Stars (Plextora)
description:
How long can you go shooting every target, without messing up?

Controls: Mouse/trackpad to aim. Right arrow key, space ,left mouse click to shoot
Right click, shift key, and esc to pause the game

You can look at the devlog for the game here!

Found a bug? Report to the GitHub Issues Page!

In case itch.io goes down, a mirror page for this website can be found here!
